column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////A large group of us went Saturday.  The place is jumping and the crowd is younger than our contemporaries
column2: but we didn't feel out of place.  The food was terrific
column3: as was the service.  Our daughter
column4: who has been going there since it opened several years ago
column5: marveled at how it has been able to maintain the consistency of excellence.  It must be because of great managers like "Jessica" who made sure that the evening was perfect.  Bravo!
